top_comments.comment: 2 propane tanks underneath with rubber hose lines? Mounted lower than the muffler? First thing that gets hit when you bottom out? You can't do that. Oh for God sakes !!

Nicely done but why not put the toilet in the shower area then you can also have privacy plus free up space in the cabinets. Just seems like there is plenty of space to put the toilet in the shower area. Then just move the toilet if you need too... 
With the curtain across the shower the toilet and the other things would be out of sight. give a real bathroom feeling to the area.
Just a thought but maybe your way works better for you... I do love the van.

comments_since_last_sample.body: The Number of times she's smacking her lips, just irritated the hell out of me, I hope she doesn't talks the same way with her clients for instead of helping them with mental health, she would wind up making them angrier or at least irritated. Still watched the video though, the van is Cool.
Love the video. I have an equipment question. Can you tell me the name or provide a link to the lavalier that is being used? I love the sound quality.
